Definition: Count of all attendances at ECHO programs, where attendee type is attendee and ECHO programs are not marked as canceled. Includes anonymous attendees where applicable.
Count of distinct attendee countries where geographic data is sufficient enough to determine country of origin.
Count of all distinct ECHO Hubs that have launched ECHO programs and recorded attendance at one or more ECHO session.
Count of distinct Launched Hub countries where geographic data is sufficient enough to determine Hub location.
